questionList.description: System or released component depend on relation Database
any external system/component or internal compoent for getting or putting data
User could input or upload a considerable number of data
Any key component to be introduced or modified, e.g. JDBC adapter, connection, trigger, scheduler, trigger
System is running in cluster mode
Any data come into system without system validation, via any entrance or activity
Key resource (server, DB, mid-ware, app container) shared with other system
